name: commit-msg
description: Git commit-msg hook using best practices

scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test-experimental: mocha --reporter spec --check-leaks ./test/experimental/*.js --globals i --globals inflect --globals indefinite_article --globals adj_to_noun --globals to_adjective --globals to_number

author: Calin Seciu
